function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of focus on built environment measures to mitigate contagious diseases","Impact":"Increased vulnerability to future pandemics and disease outbreaks","Mitigation":"Integrating built environment measures into public health strategies and policies","Technologies":"Air control systems, green areas design, and mixed-use neighborhoods","People":"Urban population, residents in densely populated areas","Owner":"Public health agencies, urban planners, policymakers"},{"Description":"Lack of public awareness and political implication in disease prevention","Impact":"Inadequate response to future pandemics and public health crises","Mitigation":"Public education and advocacy, political commitment to public health strategies","Technologies":"Communication technologies for public awareness campaigns","People":"General public, policymakers","Owner":"Health organizations, government agencies"},{"Description":"Overreliance on scientific evidence without public awareness and political commitment","Impact":"Ineffective implementation of public health measures and policies","Mitigation":"Integration of scientific evidence with public awareness campaigns and political commitment","Technologies":"Data analytics for public health decision-making","People":"Public health experts, policymakers, general public","Owner":"Public health organizations, government agencies"}]}
